sdata.j: ↑明日↑↓あした↓↑帰↑↓かえ↓ったら|↑電話|↑↓でんわ↓します。

sdata.e: The phone is ringing. "I'll get it."

sdata.e: Tell them to call me before they leave.

sdata.e: You need not telephone me.
